trans-unit.source: Automatically generates single-table commands used to reconcile changes made to a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> with the associated database.
trans-unit.target: Genera automaticamente comandi per tabella singola per risolvere le modifiche apportate a un <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> con il database associato.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo è deprecato e verrà rimossa in una futura versione di .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Oracle e ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> associated with the database.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>non genera automaticamente le istruzioni SQL necessarie per risolvere le modifiche apportate a un <xref:System.Data.DataSet>associati al database.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: However, you can create an OracleCommandBuilder object that generates SQL statements for single-table updates by setting the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, è possibile creare un oggetto OracleCommandBuilder che genera istruzioni SQL per aggiornamenti di tabelle singole impostando la <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>proprietà di <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, the OracleCommandBuilder generates any additional SQL statements that you do not set.
trans-unit.target: Quindi, il OracleCommandBuilder genera le istruzioni SQL aggiuntive che non si imposta.

trans-unit.source: The relationship between an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> and its corresponding OracleCommandBuilder is always one-to-one.
trans-unit.target: La relazione tra un <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>e il relativo OracleCommandBuilder corrispondente è sempre uno a uno.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: To create this correspondence, you set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> property of the OracleCommandBuilder object.
trans-unit.target: Per creare questa corrispondenza, impostare il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>proprietà dell'oggetto OracleCommandBuilder.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: This causes the OracleCommandBuilder to register itself as a listener, which produces the output of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that affect the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo OracleCommandBuilder registrare se stesso come un listener che produce l'output di <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventi che interessano la <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the OracleCommandBuilder uses the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to retrieve a required set of metadata.
trans-unit.target: Per generare istruzioni INSERT, UPDATE o DELETE, utilizza il OracleCommandBuilder il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>proprietà per recuperare un set di metadati richiesto.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OracleCommandBuilder also uses the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> properties referenced by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizza inoltre il OracleCommandBuilder il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>e <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A>proprietà a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Dispose%2A>, the OracleCommandBuilder is disassociated from the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, and the generated commands are no longer used.
trans-unit.target: Se si chiama <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Dispose%2A>, il OracleCommandBuilder viene annullata l'associazione di <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, e i comandi generati non vengono più utilizzati.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>Registra se stesso come un listener per <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating>gli eventi generati dal <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>specificato in questa proprietà.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, qualsiasi esistente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>associato a questo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>viene rilasciato.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref> class with the associated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>Registra se stesso come un listener per <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating>gli eventi generati dal <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>specificato in questa proprietà.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, qualsiasi esistente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>associato a questo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>viene rilasciato.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> object to associate with this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> oggetto da associare al <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> for an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"> </xref> per un'istanza di <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets a string used as the catalog separator for an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta una stringa utilizzata come separatore di catalogo per un'istanza di <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A string indicating the catalog separator for use with an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che indica il separatore di catalogo da utilizzare con un'istanza di <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> object for which this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref> object will generate SQL statements.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> oggetto per cui questo <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref> oggetto genererà le istruzioni SQL.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>Registra se stesso come un listener per <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating>gli eventi generati dal <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>specificato in questa proprietà.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, qualsiasi esistente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>associato a questo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>viene rilasciato.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> object that is associated with this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> associato all'oggetto <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> and populates the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*> collection of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Recupera le informazioni sui parametri dalla stored procedure specificata nel <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> e popolare il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*>raccolta dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: DeriveParameters overwrites any existing parameter information for the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.
trans-unit.target: DeriveParameters sovrascrive qualsiasi informazione esistente sui parametri per <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: DeriveParameters requires an extra call to the database to obtain the information.
trans-unit.target: DeriveParameters richiede un'ulteriore chiamata al database per ottenere le informazioni.

trans-unit.source: If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Se le informazioni sui parametri è noto in anticipo, risulta più efficiente per popolare la raccolta di parametri impostando le informazioni in modo esplicito.

trans-unit.source: You can only use DeriveParameters with stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare solo DeriveParameters con le stored procedure.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use DeriveParameters to populate the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection> with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare DeriveParameters per popolare il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection>con le istruzioni Transact-SQL arbitrarie, ad esempio un'istruzione SELECT con parametri.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [configurazione dei parametri e tipi di dati di parametro](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> che fa riferimento la stored procedure da cui è necessario derivare le informazioni sui parametri.

trans-unit.source: The derived parameters are added to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*> collection of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Vengono aggiunti i parametri derivati per il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*>insieme il <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: The command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"></xref> specified was not <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il testo del comando non è un nome di stored procedure valido, o <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"> </xref> specificato non è stato <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> l'oggetto richiesto per eseguire operazioni di eliminazione nel database.

trans-unit.source: You can use the GetDeleteCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il metodo GetDeleteCommand per scopi informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>oggetto da eseguire.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetDeleteCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare GetDeleteCommand come base di un comando modificato.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetDeleteCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, si potrebbe chiamare GetDeleteCommand e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valore e quindi impostare in modo esplicito che in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetDeleteCommand.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>o GetDeleteCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la generazione di comandi tramite commandbuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> l'oggetto richiesto per eseguire operazioni di eliminazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> l'oggetto richiesto per eseguire operazioni di eliminazione nel database.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>a scopo di metodo informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>oggetto da eseguire.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>come base di un comando modificato.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile chiamare <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valore e quindi impostare in modo esplicito che in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: Durante la generazione di nomi di parametro, il comportamento predefinito consiste nell'usare @p1, @p2, e così via per i diversi parametri.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Il passaggio di `true` per il `useColumnsForParameterNames` parametro consente di forzare il <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>generi i parametri in base ai nomi di colonna invece.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo ha esito positivo solo se vengono soddisfatte le condizioni seguenti: - il <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>è stato specificato e la sua lunghezza è uguale o maggiore rispetto al nome di parametro generato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -Il nome di parametro generato soddisfa i criteri specificati nel <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>espressione regolare.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>specificato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la generazione di comandi tramite commandbuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If true, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se true, generare nomi di parametro corrispondente di nomi di colonna, se possibile.

trans-unit.source: If false, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se false, generare @p1, @p2e così via.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> l'oggetto richiesto per eseguire operazioni di eliminazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire le operazioni di inserimento nel database.

trans-unit.source: You can use the GetInsertCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il metodo metodi GetInsertCommand per scopi informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>oggetto da eseguire.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetInsertCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare metodi GetInsertCommand come base di un comando modificato.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetInsertCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, si potrebbe chiamare metodi GetInsertCommand e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valore e quindi impostare in modo esplicito che in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetInsertCommand.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>o metodi GetInsertCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la generazione di comandi tramite commandbuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire le operazioni di inserimento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire le operazioni di inserimento nel database.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>a scopo di metodo informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>oggetto da eseguire.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>come base di un comando modificato.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile chiamare <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valore e quindi impostare in modo esplicito che in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: Durante la generazione di nomi di parametro, il comportamento predefinito consiste nell'usare @p1, @p2, e così via per i diversi parametri.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Il passaggio di `true` per il `useColumnsForParameterNames` parametro consente di forzare il <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>generi i parametri in base ai nomi di colonna invece.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo ha esito positivo solo se vengono soddisfatte le condizioni seguenti: - il <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>è stato specificato e la sua lunghezza è uguale o maggiore rispetto al nome di parametro generato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -Il nome di parametro generato soddisfa i criteri specificati nel <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>espressione regolare.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>specificato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la generazione di comandi tramite commandbuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If true, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se true, generare nomi di parametro corrispondente di nomi di colonna, se possibile.

trans-unit.source: If false, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se false, generare @p1, @p2e così via.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire le operazioni di inserimento.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates on the database.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire gli aggiornamenti nel database.

trans-unit.source: You can use the GetUpdateCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il metodo GetUpdateCommand per scopi informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>oggetto da eseguire.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetUpdateCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare GetUpdateCommand come base di un comando modificato.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetUpdateCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, si potrebbe chiamare GetUpdateCommand e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valore e quindi impostare in modo esplicito che in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetUpdateCommand.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>o GetUpdateCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la generazione di comandi tramite commandbuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates.
trans-unit.target: Generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire gli aggiornamenti.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates on the database.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire gli aggiornamenti nel database.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>a scopo di metodo informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>oggetto da eseguire.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>come base di un comando modificato.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile chiamare <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valore e quindi impostare in modo esplicito che in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: Durante la generazione di nomi di parametro, il comportamento predefinito consiste nell'usare @p1, @p2, e così via per i diversi parametri.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Il passaggio di `true` per il `useColumnsForParameterNames` parametro consente di forzare il <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>generi i parametri in base ai nomi di colonna invece.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo ha esito positivo solo se vengono soddisfatte le condizioni seguenti: - il <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>è stato specificato e la sua lunghezza è uguale o maggiore rispetto al nome di parametro generato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -Il nome di parametro generato soddisfa i criteri specificati nel <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>espressione regolare.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>specificato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la generazione di comandi tramite commandbuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If true, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se true, generare nomi di parametro corrispondente di nomi di colonna, se possibile.

trans-unit.source: If false, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se false, generare @p1, @p2e così via.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates.
trans-unit.target: Generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire gli aggiornamenti.

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier, including properly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Dato un identificatore non racchiusi tra virgolette nel caso del catalogo, restituisce il corretto formato dell'identificatore, inclusi eventuali virgolette incorporate nell'identificatore di escape per virgolette.

trans-unit.source: The original unquoted identifier.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore non racchiusi tra virgolette originale.

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Versione dell'identificatore tra virgolette.

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are properly escaped.
trans-unit.target: Le virgolette incorporate all'interno dell'identificatore correttamente vengono sottoposti a escape.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il carattere da utilizzare per il separatore tra l'identificatore dello schema e tutti gli identificatori.

trans-unit.source: Generally, database servers indicate the schema for a identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character.
trans-unit.target: In genere, i server di database indicano lo schema di un identificatore separando il nome dello schema dall'identificatore con un carattere.

trans-unit.source: For example, SQL Server uses a colon, creating complete identifiers such as Person:CustomerName, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, SQL Server utilizza i due punti, la creazione di identificatori completi, ad esempio persona: NomeCliente, dove "Person" è il nome dello schema e "CustomerName" è l'identificatore.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property allows developers to modify this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Impostazione di questa proprietà consente agli sviluppatori di modificare questo comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The character to be used as the schema separator.
trans-unit.target: Carattere da utilizzare come separatore di schema.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier, including properly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Dato un identificatore tra virgolette, restituisce il formato corretto senza virgolette dell'identificatore, inclusi correttamente sottoposte a escape eventuali virgolette incorporate nell'identificatore.

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore da cui verranno rimosse le virgolette incorporate.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes properly un-escaped.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore non racchiusi tra virgolette con virgolette incorporate correttamente sottoposti a escape.
